summary: Retextured Akaviri Blade + Sheathe to bring out details that were squashed out + Dragon Engraving.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve personally thought that the Akaviri blades were a little too dull, considering the fact that they are based on Japanese Katanas. A blackened katana with dreary decoration isn\'t a very good one!
P.S. Didn\'t the old hilt kind of look like a dog turd wrapped around it?


- Brightened/ polished the blade
- Engraved a Japanese dragon on the base of the blade
- Changed the underlaying colour on the hilt to Green, rather than the dull Orange/Brown
- Brightened the hilt to more of a golden tone, brought out the Dragon ornamentation
- Updated the Sheathe to match

If you\'re like me and want to kick some dragon ass with a bit more style, this one\'s for you!

INSTALLATION:
Simply unpack and drop into your Skyrim/Data/Textures folder!

To uninstall, just delete the folder

Endorse \'em if you like \'em!
author: Gooneacehole
